name: Pendulum (nielisson, Naphtalene, Jorge Baptista)
description:
What if you could try out a different version of the present moment? What would you do?

In Pendulum, a steampunk-inspired 2D platformer, our hero is striving to survive in this mysterious and hostile place that is full of traps and enemies. Aside from being able to attack the enemies, he can use his future version of himself to check what is ahead. This mechanics will allow the player to "foresee what the player cant't see right away and solve some puzzles.

This is our submission to Extra Credits game jam 2018. We  hope you enjoy this little demo. ^^

Thanks for playing!
